author: 13abc
title: 21-year-old behind bars after armed robbery
text:
TOLEDO (13abc Action News) - A 21-year-old man is behind bars after an armed robbery Monday.
Toledo police say that Nickolas Allen entered the Check into Cash on Jackman Rd. around 12:45 P.M. Monday.
Allen brandished a firearm and demanded money from the cashier.
That cashier complied, and and gave him "several stacks" of banded money, totaling several thousand dollars.
Allen fled the location, but was later found walking along a bike path near Bowman Park.
Officers took Allen into custody after confirming that Allen matched the description of the robbery suspect.
Several banded stacks of money were found in Allen's back pack, and detectives collected other evidence from the scene.
At this time, it is unknown how much money was recovered from Allen.
